title: Grants a director of a municipality the power to enforce the redemption of beverage containers at redemption centers
summary: Grants a director of a municipality the power to enforce the redemption of beverage containers at redemption centers; grants the same powers as environmental conservation officers pursuant to the litter and solid waste control provisions.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to granting the director of a municipality the power to enforce the redemption of beverage containers at redemption centers
